text: <a href="../1-Chronicles-27-1/" title="1 Chronicles 27:1 KJV verse detail"><span id="3" class="versehover">1 Now the children of Israel after their number, *to wit*, the chief fathers and captains of thousands and hundreds, and their officers that served the king in any matter of the courses, which came in and went out month by month throughout all the months of the year, of every course *were* twenty and four thousand.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-27-2/" title="1 Chronicles 27:2 KJV verse detail"><span id="4" class="versehover">2 Over the first course for the first month *was* Jashobeam the son of Zabdiel: and in his course *were* twenty and four thousand.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-27-3/" title="1 Chronicles 27:3 KJV verse detail"><span id="5" class="versehover">3 Of the children of Perez *was* the chief of all the captains of the host for the first month.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-27-4/" title="1 Chronicles 27:4 KJV verse detail"><span id="6" class="versehover">4 And over the course of the second month *was* Dodai an Ahohite, and of his course *was* Mikloth also the ruler: in his course likewise *were* twenty and four thousand.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-27-5/" title="1 Chronicles 27:5 KJV verse detail"><span id="7" class="versehover">5 The third captain of the host for the third month *was* Benaiah the son of Jehoiada, a chief priest: and in his course *were* twenty and four thousand.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-27-6/" title="1 Chronicles 27:6 KJV verse detail"><span id="8" class="versehover">6 This *is that* Benaiah, *who was* mighty *among* the thirty, and above the thirty: and in his course *was* Ammizabad his son.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-27-7/" title="1 Chronicles 27:7 KJV verse detail"><span id="9" class="versehover">7 The fourth *captain* for the fourth month *was* Asahel the brother of Joab, and Zebadiah his son after him: and in his course *were* twenty and four thousand.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-27-8/" title="1 Chronicles 27:8 KJV verse detail"><span id="10" class="versehover">8 The fifth captain for the fifth month *was* Shamhuth the Izrahite: and in his course *were* twenty and four thousand.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-27-9/" title="1 Chronicles 27:9 KJV verse detail"><span id="11" class="versehover">9 The sixth *captain* for the sixth month *was* Ira the son of Ikkesh the Tekoite: and in his course *were* twenty and four thousand.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-27-10/" title="1 Chronicles 27:10 KJV verse detail"><span id="12" class="versehover">10 The seventh *captain* for the seventh month *was* Helez the Pelonite, of the children of Ephraim: and in his course *were* twenty and four thousand.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-27-11/" title="1 Chronicles 27:11 KJV verse detail"><span id="13" class="versehover">11 The eighth *captain* for the eighth month *was* Sibbecai the Hushathite, of the Zarhites: and in his course *were* twenty and four thousand.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-27-12/" title="1 Chronicles 27:12 KJV verse detail"><span id="14" class="versehover">12 The ninth *captain* for the ninth month *was* Abiezer the Anetothite, of the Benjamites: and in his course *were* twenty and four thousand.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-27-13/" title="1 Chronicles 27:13 KJV verse detail"><span id="15" class="versehover">13 The tenth *captain* for the tenth month *was* Maharai the Netophathite, of the Zarhites: and in his course *were* twenty and four thousand.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-27-14/" title="1 Chronicles 27:14 KJV verse detail"><span id="16" class="versehover">14 The eleventh *captain* for the eleventh month *was* Benaiah the Pirathonite, of the children of Ephraim: and in his course *were* twenty and four thousand.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-27-15/" title="1 Chronicles 27:15 KJV verse detail"><span id="17" class="versehover">15 The twelfth *captain* for the twelfth month *was* Heldai the Netophathite, of Othniel: and in his course *were* twenty and four thousand.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-27-16/" title="1 Chronicles 27:16 KJV verse detail"><span id="18" class="versehover">16 Furthermore over the tribes of Israel: the ruler of the Reubenites *was* Eliezer the son of Zichri: of the Simeonites, Shephatiah the son of Maachah:
<a href="../1-Chronicles-27-17/" title="1 Chronicles 27:17 KJV verse detail"><span id="19" class="versehover">17 Of the Levites, Hashabiah the son of Kemuel: of the Aaronites, Zadok:
<a href="../1-Chronicles-27-18/" title="1 Chronicles 27:18 KJV verse detail"><span id="20" class="versehover">18 Of Judah, Elihu, *one* of the brethren of David: of Issachar, Omri the son of Michael:
<a href="../1-Chronicles-27-19/" title="1 Chronicles 27:19 KJV verse detail"><span id="21" class="versehover">19 Of Zebulun, Ishmaiah the son of Obadiah: of Naphtali, Jerimoth the son of Azriel:

<a href="../1-Chronicles-27-20/" title="1 Chronicles 27:20 KJV verse detail"><span id="22" class="versehover">20 Of the children of Ephraim, Hoshea the son of Azaziah: of the half tribe of Manasseh, Joel the son of Pedaiah:

<a href="../1-Chronicles-27-21/" title="1 Chronicles 27:21 KJV verse detail"><span id="23" class="versehover">21 Of the half *tribe* of Manasseh in Gilead, Iddo the son of Zechariah: of Benjamin, Jaasiel the son of Abner:
<a href="../1-Chronicles-27-22/" title="1 Chronicles 27:22 KJV verse detail"><span id="24" class="versehover">22 Of Dan, Azareel the son of Jeroham. These *were* the princes of the tribes of Israel.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-27-23/" title="1 Chronicles 27:23 KJV verse detail"><span id="25" class="versehover">23 But David took not the number of them from twenty years old and under: because the LORD had said he would increase Israel like to the stars of the heavens.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-27-24/" title="1 Chronicles 27:24 KJV verse detail"><span id="26" class="versehover">24 Joab the son of Zeruiah began to number, but he finished not, because there fell wrath for it against Israel; neither was the number put in the account of the chronicles of king David.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-27-25/" title="1 Chronicles 27:25 KJV verse detail"><span id="27" class="versehover">25 And over the king's treasures *was* Azmaveth the son of Adiel: and over the storehouses in the fields, in the cities, and in the villages, and in the castles, *was* Jehonathan the son of Uzziah:

<a href="../1-Chronicles-27-26/" title="1 Chronicles 27:26 KJV verse detail"><span id="28" class="versehover">26 And over them that did the work of the field for tillage of the ground *was* Ezri the son of Chelub:

<a href="../1-Chronicles-27-27/" title="1 Chronicles 27:27 KJV verse detail"><span id="29" class="versehover">27 And over the vineyards *was* Shimei the Ramathite: over the increase of the vineyards for the wine cellars *was* Zabdi the Shiphmite:

<a href="../1-Chronicles-27-28/" title="1 Chronicles 27:28 KJV verse detail"><span id="30" class="versehover">28 And over the olive trees and the sycomore trees that *were* in the low plains *was* Baalhanan the Gederite: and over the cellars of oil *was* Joash:

<a href="../1-Chronicles-27-29/" title="1 Chronicles 27:29 KJV verse detail"><span id="31" class="versehover">29 And over the herds that fed in Sharon *was* Shitrai the Sharonite: and over the herds *that were* in the valleys *was* Shaphat the son of Adlai:

<a href="../1-Chronicles-27-30/" title="1 Chronicles 27:30 KJV verse detail"><span id="32" class="versehover">30 Over the camels also *was* Obil the Ishmaelite: and over the asses *was* Jehdeiah the Meronothite:

<a href="../1-Chronicles-27-31/" title="1 Chronicles 27:31 KJV verse detail"><span id="33" class="versehover">31 And over the flocks *was* Jaziz the Hagerite. All these *were* the rulers of the substance which *was* king David's.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-27-32/" title="1 Chronicles 27:32 KJV verse detail"><span id="34" class="versehover">32 Also Jonathan David's uncle was a counsellor, a wise man, and a scribe: and Jehiel the son of Hachmoni *was* with the king's sons:

<a href="../1-Chronicles-27-33/" title="1 Chronicles 27:33 KJV verse detail"><span id="35" class="versehover">33 And Ahithophel *was* the king's counsellor: and Hushai the Archite *was* the king's companion:

<a href="../1-Chronicles-27-34/" title="1 Chronicles 27:34 KJV verse detail"><span id="36" class="versehover">34 And after Ahithophel *was* Jehoiada the son of Benaiah, and Abiathar: and the general of the king's army *was* Joab.
